subject: Diving (Sports Event)

Tennis
lead_paragraph: The diving World Cup continued in London, and Sarah Hebert departed Almadies, Senegal, in her quest to become the first woman to sail across the Atlantic Ocean on a windsurfing board.
snippet: The diving World Cup continued in London, and Sarah Hebert departed Almadies, Senegal, in her quest to become the first woman to sail across the Atlantic Ocean on a windsurfing board.
